name: Fixed Fate Bravado
description:
A Tiny Roguelike RPG Where Both You And Your Enemy Roll the Same Dice.

THREE CHAMPIONS OF FATE FACE DOWN THE FORCES OF DARKNESS! 

CONTROLS:

The cards in the top right are you and your opponent's abilities. Drag and drop them next to the dice number you want them to trigger on- they should snap into place nicely! 

Abilities are triggered left to right, so be clever in how you order them. You can always move cards about after you have placed them.

Requires a mouse to play.

-Classic RPG combat with a twist: Link every side of the die to combat abilities- for both you and your enemy. 

-Tactically random roguelike: Will you bet everything you have on a single side? Or spread out your abilities evenly to guarantee at least one of them goes off.

-Villain roulette: The cast of every run is randomised. Your party leader may become Darkness’ champion next time you play.

-The sound of die-lence: All in-game sound effects created using dice. Music is Legends by Kim Lightyear (https://pixabay.com/music/upbeat-kim-lightyear-legends-109307/).
